question.text: What should you use your horn for?

explanation.text: Your horn must not be used between 11.30 pm and 7 am in a built-up area or when you are stationary, unless a moving vehicle poses a danger. Its function is to alert other road users to your presence.

answer.text: To alert others to your presence
To allow you right of way
